t: About Afton Press – Afton Press

t: Support Afton Historical Society Press on GiveMN
s: Afton Press is a not-for-profit publisher of exceptional books that explore and celebrate the history, culture, and achievements of Minnesota. We are presently committed to creating wholly new and original books on Minnesota art and history subjects by leading Minnesota art historians.

t: Collection: Afton Press records | University of Minnesota Archival Collections Guides
s: Afton Press (formerly Afton Historical Society Press) is a not-for-profit book publisher specializing in history, culture, and Minnesota-centric publications. Founded in 1993 by W. Duncan MacMillan, the press began in Afton, Minnesota, under the name Afton Historical Society Press.
